description:
The advantage of working from home can also be its downfall. Telecommuting allows for a more flexible schedule which often leads to career management issues. Here are some important tips to keep telecommuters and home-businesses on track.

The purpose of this introductory course isn't to provide you with detail training on all 10 Tips. Instead, it tries to help you recognize and acknowledge some things you are unknowingly doing. The first step in correcting those traits is to recognize them.
title: 10 Tips for Telecommuters
